result.execSummary:
All charges against Aaron Lewis Kobs in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Aaron Lewis Kobs is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aaron Lewis Kobs

records.addlTxt: for Pymt of Atty Fees filed by Atty N Davis totaling $2177.07. Includes 22CM12, 22CM34, 22CM115, 22CM492, 22CM493. jaf     To EFV
And Affidavit for atty fees filed by Atty N Davis. Includes 22CM12, 22CM34, 22CM115, 22CM492, 22CM493. jaf

10:43 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: Christianson.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nicholas Von Davis in court for Aaron Lewis Kobs. Defendant Aaron Lewis Kobs in court, in custody. Includes 22CM12, 22CM34, 22CM115, 22CM492 and 22CM493. Court reviews case. Atty Davis requests all cases to be resolved today. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Count 1: Battery WITH enhancer- 940.19(1) in 22CM492 and Guilty to Count 1: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping- 94649(1)(a) in 22CM115. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty to Count 1 in 22CM492 and Count 1 in 22CM115. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Cts 2-5 in 22CM492, Ct 2 in 22CM115, 22CM12, 22CM34, and 22CM493. Sentencing arguments. Court removes JT. 

Court Orders:

22CM492 Count 1: 60 days jail. to commence today. Concurrent with 22CM115 Count 1. 29 days credit

- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. 
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200.00. Apply Bond. 

22CM115 Count 1: 60 days jail. to commence today. Concurrent with22CM492 Count 1. 29 days credit

- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. Apply Bond. B
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200.00. Apply Bond. 

All court obligations are to be converted to civil judgement. 

Adjourned at11:12 AM
Order for payment on September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

FOR ATTY FEES. DE to pay $50/mo comm 9/7/22. PPF waived. DE will be mailed an amended Order for Pymt. Includes 22CM12, 22CM34, 22CM115, 22CM492 and 22CM493. kma

Includes 22CM12, 22CM34, & 22CM115.  Court reviews file.  Atty Davis states there was a global offer but DE has declined that offer and is requesting to schedule JT.  22CM34 will be set as #1.    Cut off for negotiations is 9/8/22.  If no agreement is reached all motions, jury instructions and witness lists are due by 9/16/22.   DE updates address and confirms phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 3:29 PM. bph  Jury trial scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:00 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Pre-trial conference on April 7, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

01:36 PM   CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson.ADA:  Michelle P Brekken   DF ATTY:  Travis Satorius   DF:  Aaron Lewis Kobs appeared. Includes 22CM34 (RW), 22CM12 (RW), and 22CM115 (INIT). 22CM115: Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender- PFAC given to DE. Atty Satorius informs Court of missed appearances.  Bond argument; Court orders Sig bond in 22CM115 and additional cash in 22CM34 and bond reinstated in 22CM12. Enters NG plea. Reserve on pre-plea rights.  Court sets STC. Court Quashed Warrants in 22CM34 and 22CM12.

*Amended*

- $250.00 on file

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kristi D. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
